scenarios.name: Core Tauri Dependencies Upgrade
scenarios.description: Verify all core Tauri packages are upgraded from beta to stable v2 and build successfully

steps.description: Check that @tauri-apps/api is upgraded from 2.0.0-beta.9 to stable v2
Check that tauri crate is upgraded from 2.0.0-beta.19 to stable v2
Check that tauri-build is upgraded from 2.0.0-beta.15 to stable v2
Execute 'pnpm build-tauri-renderer' to verify frontend builds without errors
steps.context: Build must complete successfully with updated dependencies

test_cases.expected: Version should be >=2.0.0 and not contain 'beta' or 'alpha'
Version should be >=2.0.0 and not contain 'beta' or 'alpha'

test_cases.input: Read Cargo.toml and verify tauri crate version
test_cases.expected: Version should be >=2.0.0 and not contain 'beta' or 'alpha'

test_cases.input: Read Cargo.toml and verify tauri-build version
test_cases.expected: Version should be >=2.0.0 and not contain 'beta' or 'alpha'

test_cases.input: Read Cargo.toml and verify tauri-utils version
test_cases.expected: Version should be >=2.0.0 and not contain 'beta' or 'alpha'

success: All package.json Tauri dependencies are on stable v2.0.0 or higher
All Cargo.toml Tauri dependencies are on stable v2.0.0 or higher
No beta, alpha, or rc versions present in core dependencies
Build commands execute without dependency resolution errors
failures: Beta versions still present in package.json or Cargo.toml
Dependency resolution fails due to incompatible versions
Build fails with missing or incompatible Tauri APIs
performance: Build time does not increase more than 10% compared to beta versions

snippets.purpose: Core Tauri frontend API dependencies currently on beta versions
Core Tauri Rust dependencies currently on beta versions

implementation.notes: Implementation pending - dependencies still on beta versions. Need to update to stable v2.0.0 or later.

scenarios.expectation: After upgrading, all core Tauri dependencies in package.json and Cargo.toml should be on stable v2.0.0 or higher releases without any beta, alpha, or rc designations.
scenarios.prediction: Dependencies remain on beta versions (beta.9, beta.13, beta.15, beta.19) as no upgrade work has been completed yet.
explanation: REQ-1 from PRD requires upgrading @tauri-apps/api, @tauri-apps/cli, tauri crate, tauri-build, and tauri-utils to stable v2
Current implementation shows all packages still pinned to beta versions
Tests will fail until package.json and Cargo.toml are updated with stable v2 versions
Implementation needs to replace exact beta versions with stable releases when available

design_spec_quote.selected_text: Upgrade the following core Tauri packages from beta to stable v2: @tauri-apps/api (currently 2.0.0-beta.9), @tauri-apps/cli (currently 2.0.0-beta.13), tauri crate (currently 2.0.0-beta.19), tauri-build crate (currently 2.0.0-beta.15), tauri-utils crate (currently 2.0.0-beta.15)
